person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: He said after June general elections in which the ruling three-party coalition lost its parliamentary majority , the ODS executive , led by Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus , had developed proposals on these subjects to present at the congress on Saturday in the Czech second city Brno .

Let's think step by step.

1. He (unspecified person who spoke)
2. June general elections
3. ruling three-party coalition
4. ODS executive
5. Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| He    |
| Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus |
